title: Turks & Caicos Five-Star Private Island Splendour
description: True private island paradise awaits with a five-star stay at the acclaimed COMO Parrot Cay, offering guests exclusive access to endless sun-kissed stretches of sand, vivid turquoise waters and magical evenings spent admiring the spectacular Caribbean sunset. Lavishly furnished in shades of teak, white cotton and beach house cool, this retreat overflows with chances for laidback luxury and beachside romance amid the staggering natural beauty of the Turks and Caicos archipelago. Savour light Caribbean and Asian plates at Lotus, cocktails and freshly-caught seafood at COMO Beach Club or head to COMO Shambhala Retreat for private treatments and yoga classes under the sun.
offer_address: Parrot Cay, Providenciales, British West Indies, TKCA 1ZZ, Turks and Caicos Islands
